oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Baseball team, 1912 or 1915
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The 1912 or 1915 Middle Tennessee State Normal School baseball team

The institution had its first full-time baseball coach in 1971; prior to that, coaching baseball was a part-time responsibility for assistant basketball coaches. The addition of field lighting in 1981 allowed MTSU to host night games and improve recruiting.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Baseball players; Middle Tennessee State Normal School
